ruling: - The effect of [[Greed]] only applies to cards drawn while [[Greed]] was active. If [[Jar of Greed]] is chained to [[Greed]]'s activation, [[Jar of Greed]] (Step 2) resolves and you draw 1 card for [[Jar of Greed]] before [[Greed]]'s effect (Step 1) was active, so no damage is inflicted during the End Phase. But if you chain [[Greed]] (Step 2) to [[Pot of Greed]] (Step 1), then [[Greed]] is active before [[Pot of Greed]] resolves, so the activator of [[Pot of Greed]] takes 1000 damage from [[Greed]].
- You can chain to the effect of [[Greed]] that inflicts damage.
